bio: ⛳Aspiring Industrial Engineer, Software Developer | Seeking Internship in Industrial Engineering, SAP, Programming or IT Auditing
favoriteCityDescription: Paris, a timeless city of allure and cultural richness, whispers tales of history, art, and romance at every corner. From the iconic Eiffel Tower to Montmartre's labyrinthine streets, it's a symphony of architectural marvels and culinary delights. Each moment, from Louvre's grandeur to Seine's tranquil banks, invites immersion in its timeless charm and vibrant spirit.
description: I'd like to learn Japanese. Japan is a leading country in technology and innovation, and learning Japanese would provide an edge in understanding their advancements in fields like robotics, AI, and manufacturing.

subjects.title: 4IR Technologies
subjects.description: Gaining exposure to cutting-edge technologies including Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Big Data, IoT, Sensor Technology, and Blockchain, and applying them in real-world projects.

subjects.title: Full Stack Web Dev
subjects.description: Developing proficiency in coding using JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3, React, Node.js, Express, SQL, and Python.

subjects.title: Agile Rapid Skills
subjects.description: Enhancing skills in effective planning, communication, rapid adaptation, and collaborative development through regular presentations and team collaborations.
